thread.title: Ground News - Armenian Christian remains in Evin Prison four months after arrest
thread.title_full: Ground News - Armenian Christian remains in Evin Prison four months after arrest

author: Article 18
title: Ground News - Armenian Christian remains in Evin Prison four months after arrest
text:
Summary by Article 18 An Armenian citizen, who was one of over 100 Christians arrested in Iran this summer, remains detained in Evin Prison more than four months later. Hakop Gochumyan, 35, was visiting Iran with his wife Elissa, who is an Iranian-Armenian, and their two children, when they were arrested on 15 August in Pardis, just outside Tehran.… Share menu More
